UPDATE_SCHEDULED: Update scheduled to run automatically every {minutes} minutes.
CURRENCY_UPDATE_REQUESTED: Request sent to update "{name}" using ID: {id}.
LISTINGS_FAILURE: Listings retrieval FAILED! Retrying in {retryTimeInSeconds} seconds.
CURRENCY_UPDATE_SUCCESS: Currency Update Received for IDs: {id} after {numberOfAttempts} attempt(s).
CURRENCY_UPDATE_FAILURE: Currency Update FAILED IDs: {id}. Retrying in {retryTimeInSeconds} seconds.
INVALID_CURRENCY: Unable to find currency with id: "{id}" or name: "{name}".
